name: Mas Igneus - Short Robusto
additionalNotes: Featuring an Ecuadorian High Priming Corojo â€™98 wrapper over a Brazilian binder and Nicaraguan long fillers, this blend features a balanced pH (according to the manufacturer) which makes it pair exceptionally well with robust red wines. Medium to full-bodied, Mas Igneus is strong without being assertive and will set your palate on fire with flavor.
